DOC.detailed_description: A standardized TMD examination execute patient dentist follow Research Diagnostic Criteria Temporomandibular Disorders ( RDC/ TMD ) questionnaire , Axis I II , portuguese version . The RDC/ TMD compound 31 item questionnaire ten item clinical exam . All item relate patient symptoms sign ; mandibular functional impairment ; social-demographics , social-economics , psychological e psychosocial data . The first part Axis I tend clinical ass classify TMD second , Axis II propose chronic pain score could quantify psychosocial impairment present subject profile . Others assessment instrument utilized research VAS consist 10 cm horizontal line `` pain '' leave side `` bad pain '' right side , subject instruct vertical risk level pain . The digital caliper 0,03 mm precision use measure maximal mouth opening ( MMO ) maximal inter-incisal vertical distance incisor . The subject seat 90Â° neutral head position solicit open mouth maximum unassisted without pain , maximum unassisted opening maximum assist opening . Also , portable digital pressure algometer measure sensitivity pressure become painful . The masseter temporalis muscle trigger point location use reference guarantee reproducibility proceed well assess always site . The statistical analysis perform use mean comparison parametric test Student T test non-parametrical data , Wilcoxon . Also , make descriptive statistical frequency analysis .
